languages.text: "Сей белый покров похож на иней на конденсаторах. Неужели есть миры, что состоят лишь из холода?"
"This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"
languages.original_text: "Сей белый покров похож на иней на конденсаторах. Неужели есть миры, что состоят лишь из холода?"

traits.locale_text: "This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Diese weiße Decke gleicht dem Eis, das sich auf den Kondensatoren bildet. Können aus nichts erschaffene Welten tatsächlich existieren?"
languages.original_text: "This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese weiße Decke gleicht dem Eis, das sich auf den Kondensatoren bildet. Können aus nichts erschaffene Welten tatsächlich existieren?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Cette couverture blanche est pareille au givre qui se forme sur les condensateurs. Des mondes nés de rien hormis le froid peuvent-ils vraiment exister ? »
languages.original_text: "This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"

traits.locale_text: « Cette couverture blanche est pareille au givre qui se forme sur les condensateurs. Des mondes nés de rien hormis le froid peuvent-ils vraiment exister ? »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Esta cobertura blanca es como la escarcha de los condensadores. ¿De verdad hay mundos hechos solo de frío?».
languages.original_text: "This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"

traits.locale_text: «Esta cobertura blanca es como la escarcha de los condensadores. ¿De verdad hay mundos hechos solo de frío?».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「この白いカバーは、コンデンサーにできる霜のようね。冷気だけでできた世界なんて、本当に存在するのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"

traits.locale_text: 「この白いカバーは、コンデンサーにできる霜のようね。冷気だけでできた世界なんて、本当に存在するのかしら？」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “这个白色的冰盖就像凝结在冷凝器上的霜一样。只有寒冷笼罩一切的世界，这真的存在吗？”
languages.original_text: "This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"

traits.locale_text: “这个白色的冰盖就像凝结在冷凝器上的霜一样。只有寒冷笼罩一切的世界，这真的存在吗？”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Bu beyaz örtü, kondansatörlerin üzerinde oluşan buza benziyor. Yalnızca soğuktan oluşan dünyalar gerçekten var mıymış?"
languages.original_text: "This white cover is like the frost that forms on the condensers. Can worlds made of nothing but cold truly exist?"
